Producer: Will Smith, Jon Mone, Joey McFarland, Todd Black
Production Co: Westbrook Studios, Escape Artists, McFarland Entertainment
Synopsis: "Emancipation" tells the triumphant story of Peter (Will Smith), a man who escapes from slavery, relying on his wits, unwavering faith and deep love for his family to evade cold-blooded hunters and the unforgiving swamps of Louisiana on his quest for freedom. The film is inspired by the 1863 photos of "Whipped Peter," taken during a Union Army medical examination, that first appeared in Harper's Weekly.
